DOC.brief_title: EBIS : The Eindhoven Breech Intervention Study
DOC.criteria: Single pregnancy Gestation 35 week Appropriate knowledge Dutch language Fetus 4 type breech presentation : frank breech , complete breech , incomplete breech footle presentation Previous caesarean section Indication caesarean delivery irrespective presentation Previous abruptio placenta Multiple pregnancy Ruptured membrane Nonreassuring fetal monitoring test result Hyperextended fetal head Significant uterine fetal anomaly Use thyroid medication Maternal autoimmune disease ( insulindependant diabetes mellitus ) Intrauterine growth retardation Oligohydramnios HIVpositive woman
